name: One Jump Man
description:
One Jump Man

"One Jum Man" is a platformer where you only get one jump each level. Therefore you need to use other means to traverse the levels.

Contols:

Left/Right Arrow Keys: move left/right

Space: jump

X: interact with signs

R: reload the level

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam, which had the theme "Only One"

The WebGL version was uploaded after the end of the Submission Period.
